title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama server.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate text.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot frontend that talks to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarization and Q&A on your notes.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs and declarative model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to generate text & summaries with Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama LLMs into channels with streaming replies.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.
